ARABIC: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمِ ٱلظُّلَّةِ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They denied him and the punishment of the Day of Shadow came down on them. It was indeed the punishment of a terrible Day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But they denied him, and We seized them with the torment of the Day of Shadowing (when the cloud had rained down fire). It was indeed the torment of a terrible day!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then they branded him a liar, whereupon the chastisement of the Day of Canopy overtook them. It was the chastisement of a very awesome day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They rejected him and then the torment of the gloomy day struck them. It was certainly a great torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In response they denied him – therefore the punishment of the day of the tent* seized them; that was indeed a punishment of a Great Day. (The clouds formed a tent and rained fire upon them).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But they denied him, so the torment of the Day of Shadow (a gloomy cloud) seized them. Indeed that was the torment of a Great Day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But they called him a liar, so the punishment of the day of covering overtook them; surely it was the punishment of a grievous day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But they cried him lies; then there seized them the chastisement of the Day of Shadow; assuredly it was the chastisement of a dreadful day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But they denied him, so there came on them the retribution of the day of gloom. Lo! it was the retribution of an awful day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They rejected him, and then had to suffer the punishment of a day of overshadowing gloom. That was indeed the punishment of an awful day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thenn they belied him; wherefore there laid hold of -them the torment of day of shadow. Verily it was the torment of a Mighty Day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So they impugned him, and then they were overtaken by the punishment of the day of the overshadowing cloud. It was indeed the punishment of a terrible day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But they rejected him. Then the punishment of a day of overshadowing gloom seized them, and that was the Penalty of a Great Day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But they belied him, so the torment of the day of shadow (a gloomy cloud) seized them, indeed that was the torment of a Great Day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But they belied him, then the punishment of the Day of Shadow (raining fire) seized them. Truly, it was the punishment of a dreadful day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But they denied him. So the punishment of the day of gloom gripped them. It was the punishment of a great day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they denied him, so the punishment of the day of the black cloud seized them. Indeed, it was the punishment of a terrible day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:189] But they denied him, so they were seized by the chastisement of the day of the shade (al-zulla) — a cloud which gave them shade when they suffered a bout of extreme heat but which then rained down fire on them and they were incinerated. Assuredly it was the chastisement of a tremendous day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But they denied him) they denied his message, (so there came on them the retribution of the day of gloom) the punishment came in the form of a cloud that stopped above them and burned them with its heat. (Lo! it was the retribution of an awful day) it was a severe day of chastisement for them.
